doc.title: Fanfare
doc.plot: A confident young lady, meets a 'kinda cute' young fellow for dinner and embarks on the journey that is a first date. Despite a rocky beginning, the couple gradually connect as they wrestle through the issues that make a date so enjoyably uncomfortable. Fumbling through the ever self-conscious getting to know you conversation, deciding who gets to pay the bill and dealing with that undeniably awkward moment as the evening comes to a close, it seems the two are a perfect match; But when love is involved anything can happen.
